author: mininny
content:
Hi team, 
I'm trying to run a custom pectra-devnet from scratch (from the [repo](https://github.com/ethpandaops/pectra-devnets/tree/master)), and I had some questions: 
- where does the [all.sops.yaml](https://github.com/ethpandaops/pectra-devnets/blob/master/ansible/inventories/devnet-6/group_vars/all/all.sops.yaml) come from? Do I need a separate secrets yaml file from my side?
- how is the network-configs for each devnet generated?
please let me know if this is not the right channel!

author: parithosh
content: all.sops.yaml is our secrets file, we use sops for storing encrypted data used in devnets. You can replace that with your own solution or eliminate it altogether.
